I Don't Like To Cry

I Don't Like to Cry is an EP released by Salem, Oregon-based band Sadgasm.

Artists
  • Sadgasm
Genres
  • Alt-rock
Type EP
Published December 15, 2018
Links
  • https://open.spotify.com/album/4mtfokvd7AgeSoqBp4kXs6?si=PAqrpf8wQDqdG0NcNvnQhg

The EP sees the band employing surf rock motifs, especially in the drumming of the first 3 tracks.

Tracks

  • Surf Rock America
  • It's Better with Jonny Around
  • Xx Pain Warrior Xx
  • Eating Ash
  • Sound Accumulator
